Class Armor

java.lang.Object
com.gamestore.model.SalableProduct
com.gamestore.model.Armor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<SalableProduct>
public class Armor extends SalableProduct
Represents armor that can be sold in the game store. Extends the SalableProduct class with armor-specific attributes such as defense, mobility, and durability ratings. Armor items provide protection to players in the game world, with different pieces offering various tradeoffs between protection, movement speed, and longevity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Armor

      public Armor()
      Default constructor required for JSON deserialization. Creates an empty armor with no initialized values.

    • Armor

      public Armor(String name, String description, double price, int quantity, int defense)
      Constructs a new Armor with basic attributes. This constructor is used when mobility and durability are not specified.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the armor
      description - The description of the armor
      price - The price of the armor in dollars
      quantity - The quantity available in inventory
      defense - The defense value of the armor

    • Armor

      public Armor(String name, String description, double price, int quantity, int defense, int mobility, int durability)
      Constructs a new Armor with all attributes. This is the most complete constructor that initializes all armor properties.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the armor
      description - The description of the armor
      price - The price of the armor in dollars
      quantity - The quantity available in inventory
      defense - The defense value of the armor
      mobility - The mobility rating (0-100, higher is better)
      durability - The durability rating (0-100, higher is better)

  • Method Details

    • getDefense

      public int getDefense()
      Gets the defense value of the armor. Higher defense values provide better protection against damage.
      Returns:
      The defense value

    • setDefense

      public void setDefense(int defense)
      Sets the defense value of the armor.
      Parameters:
      defense - The defense value to set (should be positive)

    • getMobility

      public int getMobility()
      Gets the mobility rating of the armor. This represents how much the armor affects movement speed. Higher values (0-100) indicate better mobility and less movement restriction.
      Returns:
      The mobility rating (0-100)

    • setMobility

      public void setMobility(int mobility)
      Sets the mobility rating of the armor.
      Parameters:
      mobility - The mobility rating to set (0-100)

    • getDurability

      public int getDurability()
      Gets the durability rating of the armor. This represents how well the armor withstands damage before breaking. Higher values (0-100) indicate more durable armor that lasts longer.
      Returns:
      The durability rating (0-100)

    • setDurability

      public void setDurability(int durability)
      Sets the durability rating of the armor.
      Parameters:
      durability - The durability rating to set (0-100)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the armor. Extends the parent class toString() method by adding armor-specific attributes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class SalableProduct
      Returns:
      A formatted string with armor details including defense, mobility, and durability
